column5: I'm not sure if even her mother would mind that crew anymore Cliff...

Just a thought! if I win I would take Beans! SERIOUSLY! I'll bet he tops most DD's, (last time I looked I'd have guesed at about a 48 EEE) he loves to fish, he isn't a bad cook, he is a great fisherman, he'd never complain about my snoring (he probably wouldn't even hear it) and I can't think of a person that would appreciate it more or that deserves it more!  I think that no mater who wins they should include Beans!

The draw is on June 2nd, this is your last chance to enter a really great contest! Good luck to all, I'll be contacting the contest winner myself next week after the magazine informs them they've won.

Was informed earlier today by OOD that Jim Derro has won the fly in trip contest. Congrat's Jim!  Not sure if Jim is a member here or not, but regardless I'll be touching base with him soon.  Big thanks to OFC for allowing me to pin this, it was greatly appreciated!
Nice job thank you for the contest from all of us at OFC.    Art

Nice job thank you for the contest from all of us at OFC.    Art   Hey I'm a part of OFC too.  According to OOD there were a lot of entries, over 5000 I believe. I'd be willing to bet the majority came from this board. I know they were very happy as well.  Here's hoping the trip is a successful one!  In the meantime I'm headed to White River early Thursday for another fly in, this one for lakers. Prepping for that one right now.

My first question was .... "Who is Mike Borger, and why would I want to go fishing with him?"  I don't consider myself new, care to fill me in?  Ignorant I'm sure, but honest none the less.  Can I take my Father or Son or Daughter? This is the best post on the thread. I would love to go but rule 8 is in the way.  Football schedule does not jive (not to mention my wife would lose her mind with my 3 kids lol)

Quote from Misfish: Gezz bro, I can't help you out, I was in the work force at age 15 Good job the figures weren't any higher, had to take my socks off, good job I have all my toes and fingers. 10X2 =20-5=15 Make this homer feel good Mike, did I get-er right. My Quote tab doesn't work???   You got it Dave.
I'd be hard pressed to decide who to take for such an adventure. My son or my mother.  Mother loves to fish as much as I do. You'd also gain a few pounds if she starts cooking
Hey if you're supplying the cook you're welcome anytime Bruce. I'll do the dishes.
....let's hope someone actually born in Chapleau and a member on the board wins!    Great contest.
Hey if you're supplying the cook you're welcome anytime Bruce. I'll do the dishes.  And if you're supplying the rum you're welcome anytime Mike.
And if you're supplying the rum you're welcome anytime Mike.  Deal!!

Are you willing to eat cheese dreams in order to up the Pepsi amount?  How many hours would you be in the boat per day? Is a D.D. a good person to bring? Sounds like it has the possibility to be a good trip!

Are you willing to eat cheese dreams in order to up the Pepsi amount? How many hours would you be in the boat per day? Is a D.D. a good person to bring? Sounds like it has the possibility to be a good trip!  What's a cheese dream? I think I understand upping the Pepsi amount.  Hours in boat? Depends on weather really.  Who's D.D.?  It's guaranteed to be a good trip!
A gal beyond D Mike..
D.D. Is part of a different dream.  Cheese dream= bread,chez whiz,bacon n a oven. Not deutsch if yer wondering about the oven now.
A gal beyond D Mike..  That was my first thought.  D.D. Is part of a different dream. Cheese dream= bread,chez whiz,bacon n a oven. Not deutsch if yer wondering about the oven now.  Gotcha.
A gal beyond D Mike..
Dang,,,,I need an Ontario address.
Dang,,,,I need an Ontario address.  Pffft...no you don't. You're welcome to join me anytime, dead serious.

Mike: I a self-designated honourary Ontarian. I have been coming north for 35 years, am a certified Neil and Gord fan (have seen both in concert numerous times), can fillet a walleye blindfolded, make my own harnesses, can name all the provinces and the PM, and am addicted to ketchup chips.  Does this count for anything?  Sincerely,  One groveling American....

Mike: I a self-designated honourary Ontarian. I have been coming north for 35 years, am a certified Neil and Gord fan (have seen both in concert numerous times), can fillet a walleye blindfolded, make my own harnesses, can name all the provinces and the PM, and am addicted to ketchup chips.  Does this count for anything?  Sincerely,  One groveling American....   It counts for plenty in my eyes!
Haa ha you missed the most important thing  poutine  the worlds nastiest stuff ever made North of the border.     Art

Haa ha you missed the most important thing  poutine  the worlds nastiest stuff ever made North of the border.     Art  I was prodded into a low carb diet a while back and I would kill for some poutine right about now. No telling what I might do for a beer.
If Im drawn,I could fix that.LOL  It,s the best thing to eat,if ya want to put weight on fast. Taste GOOD too.LOL
Sorry you will not convince me that stuff is good. Joe ran into town and got us a tray and the first 3 bites were heaven and the 4th one just hit me wrong. The 5th one was my last.   Art

Sorry you will not convince me that stuff is good. Joe ran into town and got us a tray and the first 3 bites were heaven and the 4th one just hit me wrong. The 5th one was my last.   Art   Well it,s no red beans an rice,(still my fav)

Sorry you will not convince me that stuff is good. Joe ran into town and got us a tray and the first 3 bites were heaven and the 4th one just hit me wrong. The 5th one was my last.   Art Can't be any worse than the chili  cheese fries they serve up in the States, or butter biscuits and canned gravy
I'd enter, would love to try a fly in some day, but alas there is no one willing to stay with my current crew for one day let alone 4  Good luck to all who have entered Maureen
Moe I love you dearly but even I wouldn't be willing to do that for you if you did win, besides, I'm going to win anyway so I wouldn't be here to do it for you!
Boy would that be an experience.
Nice to see a contest like this!  BTW, who's the "One additional person in attendance"?  Your body guard?
it's in the fine print- it's the "doesn't shut-up, thunder snoring, annoying, nudist guy",  so don't bother entering

Thanks again everyone, and good luck to all!   Nice to see a contest like this!  BTW, who's the "One additional person in attendance"?  Your body guard?   Good catch! It was originally going to be Aaron Shirley but OOD nixed that idea because of a conflict with their own Angler And Hunter Television. Then the host of that show Mike Miller was going to join but sheduling wouldn't allow it. Then they discussed Ray Blades joining me. Ray is the managing editor and an avid angler himself.  At this point it's not sure yet who'll join me. I dropped all the details for the contest in their lap on Monday and they've scrambled to get things up and running for the Sportsman's Show, with just this "one" detail not ironed out.  Rest assured whoever it is will be a welcome addition to the group.

Thanks again everyone, and good luck to all!     Good catch! It was originally going to be Aaron Shirley but OOD nixed that idea because of a conflict with their own Angler And Hunter Television. At this point it's not sure yet who'll join me. I dropped all the details for the contest in their lap on Monday and they've scrambled to get things up and running for the Sportsman's Show, with just this "one" detail not ironed out.  Rest assured whoever it is will be a welcome addition to the group.  If you have trouble finding someone, I guess ill volunteer to be the second guide....
Read the finer print it says the other person is going to be someone from Hamilton Virginia USA.     Art

This will be an awesome trip for sure

it's in the fine print- it's the "doesn't shut-up, thunder snoring, annoying, nudist guy",  so don't bother entering  Gee guys, thanks for the heads-up! I guess I don't need to let my wife know that I'll be part of the group, since you already spoke to her about it, right Mike?    p.-

Gee guys, thanks for the heads-up! I guess I don't need to let my wife know that I'll be part of the group, since you already spoke to her about it, right Mike?    p.-   Would love to have you along Paul (and that goes for every one of my OFC friends!)  The magazine will ultimately decide though.  Regarding the newfie sarcasm, you guys wouldn't believe how many people messaged me about the skill testing question LOL!
I wonder if Dave (fishfarmer) got the same answer as I? LOL
It would be a really nice trip, especially in the fall
I'm in. I'd love to bring my grandfather to something like this. I think if the two of us went we would just sleep in the boat.

My first question was .... "Who is Mike Borger, and why would I want to go fishing with him?"  I don't consider myself new, care to fill me in?  Ignorant I'm sure, but honest none the less.  Can I take my Father or Son or Daughter?

My first question was .... "Who is Mike Borger, and why would I want to go fishing with him?"  I don't consider myself new, care to fill me in?  Ignorant I'm sure, but honest none the less.  Can I take my Father or Son or Daughter?  I guess you don't read many trips reports here

Quote from Misfish: Gezz bro, I can't help you out, I was in the work force at age 15 Good job the figures weren't any higher, had to take my socks off, good job I have all my toes and fingers. 10X2 =20-5=15 Make this homer feel good Mike, did I get-er right. My Quote tab doesn't work???

My first question was .... "Who is Mike Borger, and why would I want to go fishing with him?"  I don't consider myself new, care to fill me in?  Ignorant I'm sure, but honest none the less.  Can I take my Father or Son or Daughter?  There's probably many people who don't know who I am, although I'm somewhat surprised that a regular on this board wouldn't.  As far as why you'd want to fish with me at Anjigaming, I'm used to guiding people and think I have a pretty good rapport with most. I've been to this lake in September before and am 100% dialed in as to where the giant walleyes are. There are good numbers of 10lb plus trophies in this lake. I would certainly do my best to make sure the trip is a success for everyone involved.  As per the rules laid out by OOD you can bring anyone you like as long as they're an Ontario resident and age of majority.  Cheers

Hey everyone I'm pleased to announce a great new contest Ontario Out Of Doors magazine is offering in conjunction with myself and Park's Fly In Fishing in Chapleau.  Two lucky winners will join me at Anjigaming Lake in late September for 4 nights - prime time for trophies!  This trip includes air transportation from Toronto to Timmins then ground transport to the airbase, so no long drives.  You can find all the details here:  http://www.oodmag.com/contests/fly-in-fishing-contest/   Good luck to all, and if anyone would like more details from me directly don't hesitate to drop me a line.   Cheers,  Mike
Forgot to mention, the trip along with the winners will be featured in a piece in the magazine!
hmmm not sure  about the skill testing question.
hmmm not sure  about the skill testing question.  One fish, two fish, blue fish?
Well rule #9 rules me out
Hey that fish looks familiar  ... do OOD subscribers get to enter more than once ? ...
Trip of a lifetime for someone for sure.  My entry submitted as fast as I could type.
Done, thank you for sharing Mike
dang, that sneaky #9...  cheers to the winners, maybe we'll see the report posted here

Thanks guys, and good luck to everyone! And yes Julian, that fish should look familar. You know better than anyone what this lake is like in late September!    Well rule #9 rules me out   dang, that sneaky #9...  cheers to the winners, maybe we'll see the report posted here   Truly sorry about that guys. I promise you the next one will include everyone!

Two quick questions with regard to Rule #9:  What does "age of majority" mean? At or higher than the average age of the entire population of Ontario? [Just kidding there, but I really have no idea what that means...]  What if you're from Quebec, the States, etc.? Not eligible?
In Ontario age of majority is 18.
Mike   ConGrats on getting this done!   Its gonna be "GOOD"   Cheers Rick

Kind of funny I rarely ever win anything, although I did win something from OOD a few years back. I'm good Mike  Good luck to those who enter
That is awesome congrats mike
One of a very rare contest worth entering. I'm not eligible but wish all of you good luck. Just imagine the fun and comradery.
I would enter but having to spend a week in a boat with you again............................ Plus I'm gonna be in Alaska chasin' fishes.
No need to enter if you want to fish with me. Just haul your rapidly shrinking butt back to Ontario.
